Remark part 1: Code element SK was formerly used for Sikkim (SK, SKM, --), now part of the entry for India (IN, IND, 356), was reused for Slovakia. See aslo code element SKIN.
Remark part 3: Czechoslovakia (CS, CSK, 200) was divided into Czech Republic (CZ, CZE, 203), and Slovakia (SK, SVK, 703). See also code element CSHH.
